short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides text recommendations for links and import paragraphs, injected in-page at the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you've ever been annoyed at having a lot of tabs open from hyperlinks or a bunch of searches to find the information you need, Denread is for you. Have a machine do this searching and hunting down links for you, to suggest to you in page, to change your page into a newsfeed with recommended text. 

Email contact@denread.com for feedback!

Currently runs on nbcnews.com only. Also, turn off your adblock for nbcnews.com. More coming soon!
